00021  * @file   test-regression-socket-run.cpp
00022  * @brief  Program for doing regression tests on sockets.

00025 // This has to be last. Otherwise windows compile fails

00041 using namespace std;
00042 
00043 class SocketTest : public RegressionSuite 
00044 {
00045 public:
00046     int numPassed;
00047     int numFailed;
00048     std::string testDir;
00049   
00050     SocketTest()
00051     {
00052         numPassed = 0;
00053         numFailed = 0;
00054     }
00055     void socketGenotypeTest();
00056     void socketGenderTest();
00057 };
00058 
00059 void SocketTest::socketGenotypeTest()
00060 { 
00061         string outdir = testDir + "/socketGenotypeTest";
00062         Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);
00063         Fs::mkdir(outdir, false);
00064         vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00065     
00066 
00067         string name = "socketGenotypeTest";
00068         const char * chpFiles [] = { "F1cross02.brlmm-p",  "F1cross03.brlmm-p",  "F1cross04.brlmm-p", "F1cross05.brlmm-p", 
00069                                      "Inbred01.brlmm-p", "Inbred02.brlmm-p", "Inbred03.brlmm-p",
00070                                      "Inbred04.brlmm-p", "Inbred05.brlmm-p", NULL
00071         };
00072         std::vector<std::string> result_files;
00073         result_files = Util::addPrefixSuffix(chpFiles, testDir , ".chp");
00074         
00075 #ifdef _WIN32
00076         string command = "apt-socket-run apt-probeset-genotype --xml-file-append-only ..\\..\\..\\regression-data\\data\\lib\\sockets\\socketGenotypeTest\\jobInbred --out-dir " + outdir ;
00077 #else
00078         string command = "./apt-socket-run ./apt-probeset-genotype --xml-file-append-only ../../../regression-data/data/lib/sockets/socketGenotypeTest/jobInbred --out-dir " + outdir;
00079 #endif
00080         for ( int i =0; i < result_files.size(); i++ ) {
00081           command = command + " --result-files " + result_files[i];
00082         }
00083         checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(Fs::join(outdir, "brlmm-p.calls.txt"),
00084                                                 "../../../regression-data/data/util/sockets/socketGenotypeTest/brlmm-p.calls.txt",
00085                                                  0.0000001,
00086                                                  1, 1, false, 0));
00087 
00088           
00089 
00090         RegressionTest socketGenotypeTest(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00091         socketGenotypeTest.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-socket-run.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00092         Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00093         if(!socketGenotypeTest.pass()) 
00094         {
00095             Verbose::out(1, "Error in socketGenotypeTest::" + name + "(): " + socketGenotypeTest.getErrorMsg());
00096             numFailed++;
00097         }
00098         else 
00099         {
00100             numPassed++;
00101         }
00102 } 
00103 
00104 void SocketTest::socketGenderTest()
00105 {
00106         string outdir = testDir + "/socketGenderTest";
00107         Fs::rmdirPath(outdir, false);
00108         Fs::mkdir(outdir, false);
00109         vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00110 
00111         string name = "socketGenderTest";
00112 
00113 #ifdef _WIN32
00114         string command = "apt-socket-run  apt-copynumber-gender --xml-file-append-only ..\\..\\..\\regression-data\\data\\lib\\sockets\\socketGenderTest\\genderxml --out-dir " + outdir;
00115 #else
00116         string command = "./apt-socket-run ./apt-copynumber-gender --xml-file-append-only ../../../regression-data/data/lib/sockets/socketGenderTest/genderxml.txt --out-dir " + outdir;
00117 #endif
00118 
00119         checks.push_back(new MatrixCheck(Fs::join(outdir, "genderCalls.txt"),
00120                                          "../../../regression-data/data/util/sockets/socketGenderTest/genderCalls.txt",
00121                                          0.0000001,
00122                                          1, 2, false, 0));
00123 
00124 
00125         RegressionTest socketGenderTest(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00126         socketGenderTest.setSuite(*this,  outdir, outdir + "/apt-socket-run.log", outdir + "/valgrind.log");
00127         Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00128         if(!socketGenderTest.pass())
00129         {
00130             Verbose::out(1, "Error in socketGenderTest::" + name + "(): " + socketGenderTest.getErrorMsg());
00131             numFailed++;
00132         }
00133         else
00134         {
00135             numPassed++;
00136         }
00137 }
00138 
00139 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00140     try {
00141         /* Set up the logging and message handlers. */
00142         FsTestDir testDir;
00143         testDir.setTestDir("util/socket-run", true);
00144 
00145         ofstream logOut;
00146         string logName;
00147         logName = testDir.asString() + "/test-regression-socket-run.log";
00148         Verbose::out(1, "Log file: " + logName);
00149         Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00150         LogStream log(3, &logOut);
00151 
00152         Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00153         Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00154         Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00155 
00156         Verbose::setLevel(3);
00157         SocketTest test;
00158         test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00159         
00160         test.parseArgv(argv);
00161         test.doValgrind();
00162         string database = test.getDatabase();
00163 
00164         Verbose::out(1, "Execute regression test: test-regression-socket_run");
00165 
00166         test.socketGenotypeTest();
00167         test.socketGenderTest();
00168 
00169         Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed) + " for test-regression-socket_run");
00170         logOut.close();
00171         return test.numFailed != 0;
00172     }
00173     catch(...) {
00174         Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00175         return 1;
00176     }
00177     return 1;
00178 }
